description: Pitfalls to avoid when mapping outcomes and optimizing flow.
applyTo: 'bvssh/**/*.md, kb/outcome-mapping/**/*.md, .github/workflows/**/*.md'
---
# Common Pitfalls

- Optimizing non-constraints; mapping too many streams at once.
- Treating maps as documentation instead of decision tools.
- Turning the roadmap into a feature plan.
- Weak, generic signals and guardrails; vague behaviors.
